introduction: What If? App is an online web application that allows users to swap faces in photos, videos, and GIFs instantly using AI technology. It works on iPhone, Android, Windows, and Mac without the need for any additional software or technical skills.
features: Realistic AI Quality: Latest technology AI swaps any face sharp and ultra realistic.
Multiple Face Detection: AI detects all faces in videos, gifs or photos. You can select and swap any face in any media.
Online Web App: No photoshop or any software download or skill needed. You can swap any face instantly with just one click.
Morph Faces: Merge faces for face swap memes with the best face swap app - What If? App.
Unleash Your Creativity: Ruin reality. Become celebrity, hero or a movie character. Become anyone. Your creativity is the only limit.
Intuitive Interface: Enjoy a user-friendly experience with a straightforward design, making ai face swapping effortless for everyone, regardless of technical expertise.
targetPeople: Anyone interested in face swapping for fun, creativity, or social media content.

faqs.question: How do I swap faces?
faqs.answer: It's just one click. Upload any face and swap instantly. What If App supports Photo, Video, GIF. No photoshop or software needed.

faqs.answer: Works online on iPhone, Android, Windows and Mac.

faqs.answer: Yes, AI face swapping is free to try. No credit card or login required.
